original_text:
And the mountains will melt under him,
    and the valleys will split open,
like wax before the fire,
    like waters poured down a steep place.
korean_text: 그 아래에서 산들이 녹고 골짜기들이 갈라지기를 불 앞의 밀초 같고 비탈로 쏟아지는 물 같을 것이니

sentences.original_text: And the mountains will melt under him
and the valleys will split open
like waters poured down a steep place
